description: Try our easy to follow Pork With Cranberry Sauce & Cabbage Mash recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pork With Cranberry Sauce & Cabbage Mash Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Blanch cabbage in boiling water for 1 minute. Drain well. Cook potatoes in boiling, salted water for 8-10 minutes until tender. Drain and return to pan. Mash with a potato masher.
Return pan to heat, add milk and butter and stir over heat until smooth. Stir in cabbage and spring onions, season well with salt and pepper.
Heat oil in a large frying pan, season chops and cook in batches, for 2-3 minutes each side or until cooked through. Transfer to a plate, cover with foil and keep warm.
Add wine to the same pan, bring to the boil and simmer for 1 minute. Add cranberry sauce, mustard, orange rind and juice and simmer for 5 minutes or until sauce has thickened.
Serve pork with cabbage mash, sauce and steamed beans.
